item.title: “I sold my soul to McDonald’s”
item.description: This book contains a crucial evidence that McDonald’s Corporation executives could have easily, through a simple phone call, stop the ongoing frauds which were happening in France, and later in Europe. Then, why didn’t they? In addition to the fact that there is an undeniable proof that, contrarily to what Gloria Santona said, this was a French problem, the book offers additional insights about how McDonald’s seems to corrupt politicians.
